titleStmt.title: The sonne of the rogue, or, The politick theefe with the antiquitie of theeves : a worke no lesse curious then delectable / first written in Spanish by Don Garcia ; afterwards translated into Dutch, and then into French by S.D. ; now Englished by W.M.
De sordenada codicia de los bienes agenos. English
titleStmt.author: García, Carlos, doctor.
W. M. (William Melvin)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I.D. for Michael Sparkes and are to [be] sold in Green-Arbor,
